post.author: 이계영
post.content:
What we need is someone who is a superb with J2EE. They must have solid experience with distributed programming (CORBA & RMI). Also in the context of J2EE the experience should be in controlling network equipment (i.e. protocols, subscribers, policies, etc.) rather than web applications development.
Any integration with provision system, billing, and account management systems is also a big plus as is RADIUS.
Please send me your updated resume in Word format. Else I would appreciate if you could refer your friend or colleague to contact me ASAP.
Thanks, Rich Malhotra Director of Professional Services Beyond Innovation Inc. Ph. 408.501.0002 Fax. 408.884.2465 rich@bi-usa.biz
post.title: J2EE Developer
